name: ChipSpace
description:
Welcome to ChipSpace! You are in charge of a little robot who has to complete tasks. However, there are no direct controls. Instead, you have to program its chip so it can do it's job properly!

Controls:

Left mouse button:

  • Select an instruction
  • Place instruction on chip
  • Click and drag to multiselect on the chip

Right mouse button:

  • Rotate/flip a placed instruction
  • Click and drag to rotate the level

Middle mouse button:

  • Delete instruction (held or on chip)

Scroll wheel:

  • Rotate/flip currently held instruction

Ctrl-Z: Undo

Ctrl-Y: Redo

This game is very much a work in progress, I appreciate any and all feedback!
